subject: Education
title: Adaptive Learning: AI That Adjusts to You
description: A fast breakdown of Adaptive Learning: AI That Adjusts to You for builders.

hook.text: What if your textbook could tell you were confused and simplify itself? That's adaptive learning.

buildup.text: Adaptive learning platforms track student responses and adjust difficulty, pace, and content in real time.

discovery.text: The goal: approximate one-on-one tutoring at scale, matching Bloom's 2-sigma ideal.

twist.text: Current systems adapt content well but can't adapt motivation, relationships, or emotional support.

climax.text: The most effective implementations pair AI adaptation with human teacher oversight.

punchline.text: The smartest algorithm still needs a teacher who cares.

quiz.question: What is the main limitation of current adaptive learning systems?
options: They can adapt content but not motivation, relationships, or emotional support
They are too expensive for any school to afford
They only work for math and science subjects
